body_html: I think we should just remove this functionality for now (raise an error when register_backward_hook is called). It never worked correctly and is really hard to implement. I don't think the checkpointing way is good in this case, because it can cause certain backward hooks to trigger multiple times, and that's generally not what you want. It also doesn't work with .grad.

body: I think we should just remove this functionality for now (raise an error when `register_backward_hook` is called). It never worked correctly and is really hard to implement. I don't think the checkpointing way is good in this case, because it can cause certain backward hooks to trigger multiple times, and that's generally not what you want. It also doesn't work with `.grad`.
